title: (x) Decorative geometric sans serif - House Chalet {Marc O}
content:
I need the name of this font and I’m having trouble locating it, so I turn to the gurus. Does anyone know the name of this one?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121131627im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/dazed_4638.gif)

 [‹ Jax vegan cafe logo freeform sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121131627/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41047 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Fight Quest logo - Compacta (modified) {Lex} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121131627/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41094 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Tonie Blaze

comments.content:
Media TS-XBold is close, but not quite.  
Looking around still

Gotta go.  
Good luck finding it.....

It’s Chalet 1980, either the London or New York weight.

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121131627/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts")
